thread.title: India's Space Station Plans, Price Cap On More Medical Equipments And Other Must Read Stories - Indiatimes.com
thread.title_full: India's Space Station Plans, Price Cap On More Medical Equipments And Other Must Read Stories - Indiatimes.com

title: India's Space Station Plans, Price Cap On More Medical Equipments And Other Must Read Stories - Indiatimes.com
text:
Indiatimes February 21, 2017 
Fresh from the success of the record-breaking 104 satellite launch ISRO said the organization has the capability to develop a space station if it wanted. ISRO chairman A S Kiran Kumar said it needed a long-term approach and an ambitious planning. 
"We have all the capabilities to set up a space station. The day the country takes the decision, we will 'ok' the project. Just draw a policy and provide us necessary funds and time." Read more 1. Former CBI Chief AP Singh Who Oversaw The Arrests Of A Raja And Suresh Kalmadi Now Booked In Corruption Case 
In a significant development, the Central Bureau of Investigation has named its former director AP Singh as an 'accused' along with controversial meat exporter Moin Qureshi in a case registered to probe alleged corruption. 
Moin Akhtar Qureshi, who is also under probe by the Income Tax department and the Enforcement Directorate, is accused of operating as a middleman for several public servants including AP Singh. Read more 2. After Price Cap On Stents, Government To Regulate Prices Of Artificial Heart Valves And Syringes 
After cardiac stents, around 14 more medical devices that are rampantly sold at inflated rates in hospitals, could see a price regulation in the coming months . The list includes orthopedic implants, intraocular lenses and artificial heart valves to consumables such as syringes, needles and catheters. 
The National Pharmaceutical Pricing Authority (NPPA) has begun scrutiny of such devices, even asking makers to log in every detail about their manufacture and cost. Read more 3. Pakistan Defence Minister Has Suddenly Become 'Indian Mouthpiece' For Saying Hafiz Saeed Is A Threat To The Country 
Khawaja Muhammad Asif, the Pakistan Defence Minister who has, on more than one occasion, threatened to use the country's nukes against India, has suddenly become an "Indian mouthpiece'. Don't Miss
